title: The Complete Excel Bundle: MBA & Startup Toolbox
text:
Access 30 lectures & 3 hours of content 24/7

Become proficient in Excel data tools like Sorting, Filtering, Data validations & Data importing

Visually enchant viewers using Bar charts, Scatter Plots, Histograms, Waterfall charts & more

Become competent in using advanced Analytics techniques in Excel such as Regression, Goal Seek & Solver

Make great presentations using the Conditional & Table formatting options

Whether you're new to Excel or you've played around with it but want to get more comfortable with its advanced features, this course will be great for you. This course covers everything you need to crack Excel in the professional workplace from mathematical functions and formulas up to tables and charts. By the end of this course, your confidence in using Excel will soar. You'll have a thorough understanding of how to use Microsoft Excel for study or as a career opportunity.
